\begin{equation}
    \label{Dirac eq:1}
    i\hbar\frac{\partial \psi}{\partial t} = \left( -i\hbar c \vec{\alpha} \cdot \nabla + \beta mc^2 \right) \psi
\end{equation}

\begin{equation}
    \label{eq:4}
    \gamma^\mu \gamma^\nu + \gamma^\nu \gamma^\mu = 2g^{\mu\nu}I
\end{equation}
